I'm hearing rumors from every direction. Something about a Ceremony of Blessing? And this new camp: Alethea's Last Hope. I think that should be your next stop.

Lene headed that way. Maybe she'll know what to do.

Hmm? Korwyn sent you, did he? Good to know he's all right—I haven't been able to check in with him lately. I ran into federation soldiers, and they brought me here.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Korwyn mentioned a Ceremony of Blessing?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Ah! He heard that much at least? Good. I'm glad some news is still getting out there. I'll get into the specifics in a bit.

What you need to know now is that we have uninfected vampirs helping us—Uninfected, so don't go flashing that weapon around, okay?

We're going to get to the bottom of this, soon.
